column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I made plans to meet a friend in the city .
#id=2
#text=Normally I would drive but there is a lot of traffic and very little parking in the city so decided to take the bus .
#id=3
#text=I made sure I had enough fare and left the house .
#id=4
#text=I walked to the bus stop and there was two elderly people waiting before me .
#id=5
#text=I waited on line and short time later I saw the bus coming .
#id=6
#text=The bus stopped in front of us and the elderly people got on first .
#id=7
#text=I got on the bus after them and then paid my bus fare .
#id=8
#text=I could n't find any seats so I held on the the metal handles provided in the bus so I would n't fall .
#id=9
#text=After awhile I saw that my destination was near and should get off .
#text=I pushed the button that sent a signal requesting the bus to stop at the next bus top .
#text=The bus pulled over at the next stop and I got off the bus .
#text=I met my friend a few blocks down at a restaurant and had a great time .
